SEARCH
Module codex.lb
Package codex.lb04.View

Class ViewController

java.lang.Object
codex.lb04.View.ViewController
Direct Known Subclasses:
CliController, GuiController
public abstract class ViewController extends Object
ViewController abstract class that is extended by controller classes that need to update the view in the different modes (GUI or CLI).
